graph_title: The share of families receiving social benefits to households
indicator_name: The share of families receiving social benefits to households
national_indicator_description: The indicator is the share of families receiving social benefits from the total number of houswholds.
computation_definitions: State benefit is regular or one-time financial assistance provided from the state budget.
computation_calculations: The ratio of families receiving social benefits to households.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Labour and Social Affaires of RA
